sources.title: So Sad About Gloria (1973)
sources.description: A young woman just released from a mental hospital moves back in with her family. However, she is soon troubled by disturbing visions in which she commits a series of axe murders.

metadata.Plot: A young woman just released from a mental hospital moves back in with her family. However, she is soon troubled by disturbing visions in which she commits a series of axe murders.
metadata.Writer: Marshall Riggan, Joe Glass, Harry Thomason
metadata.Actors: Lori Saunders, Robert Ginnaven, Dean Jagger
